hadiths.text: It was narrated from Samurah bin Jundub that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“Whoever becomes the master of a Mahram relative (with whom marriage is not lawful), he becomes free.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ مَلَكَ ذَا رَحِمٍ مَحْرَمٍ فَهُوَ حُرٌّ
chapter.eng-name: If A Person Becomes The Master Of A Mahram, Then He Becomes Free
